TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EncryptionAlgorithm extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Aes128 = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The client supports the AES 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Aes192 = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The client supports the AES 192-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Aes256 = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The client supports the AES 256-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Camellia128 = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Camellia 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Camellia192 = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Camellia 192-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Camellia256 = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Camellia 256-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Cast5 = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Cast-5 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Des = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The client supports the DES 56-bit encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is extremely weak encryption and should not be used without consent from the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm Idea = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The client supports the IDEA 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm RC2128 = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The client supports the RC2 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm RC240 = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The client supports the RC2 40-bit encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is extremely weak encryption and should not be used without consent from the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm RC264 = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The client supports the RC2 64-bit encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is very weak encryption and should not be used without consent from the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.EncryptionAlgorithm TripleDes = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Triple-DES encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is the weakest recommended encryption algorithm for use starting with S/MIME v3 and should only be used as a fallback if it is unknown what encryption algorithms are supported by the recipient's mail client.
